Package dbproject.client

Class ClientTUI

java.lang.Object
dbproject.client.ClientTUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientListener, ClientMoveInput
public class ClientTUI extends Object implements ClientListener, ClientMoveInput
A TUI for the clients of a Dots n Boxes game.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientTUI

      public ClientTUI(InputStream in, OutputStream out, ClientTUI.TUIType tuiType, String description)
      Creates a new TUI for a dots n boxes game.
      Parameters:
      in - InputStream to use
      out - OutputStream to use
      tuiType - Type of player to create, human or AI
      description - Client description to send to server

  • Method Details

    • runTUI

      public void runTUI()
      Main TUI loop.

      Calls the upcoming state when a previous one finishes. Exits the TUI and stops the client when the next state is UIState.EXIT.

    • connectionLost

      public void connectionLost()
      Called when connection is lost. Adds state UIState.EXIT
      Specified by:
      connectionLost in interface ClientListener

    • loginConfirmation

      public void loginConfirmation()
      Called when a login confirmation is received. Adds state UIState.RECEIVED_LOGIN
      Specified by:
      loginConfirmation in interface ClientListener

    • alreadyLoggedIn

      public void alreadyLoggedIn()
      Called when an already logged in message is received. Adds state UIState.RECEIVED_ALREADY_LOGGED_IN
      Specified by:
      alreadyLoggedIn in interface ClientListener

    • serverHello

      public void serverHello()
      Called when a hello message is received. Adds state UIState.RECEIVED_HELLO
      Specified by:
      serverHello in interface ClientListener

    • userList

      public void userList(String[] users)
      Called when a list of users is received. Print list and then returns to callback state.
      Specified by:
      userList in interface ClientListener
      Parameters:
      users - List of users

    • newGame

      public void newGame()
      Called when a new game message is received. Adds state UIState.RECEIVED_NEW_GAME
      Specified by:
      newGame in interface ClientListener

    • receiveMove

      public void receiveMove(int location)
      Called when a move is received. Adds state UIState.RECEIVED_MOVE
      Specified by:
      receiveMove in interface ClientListener
      Parameters:
      location - Location of the received move

    • receiveError

      public void receiveError()
      Called when an error message is received. Adds state UIState.RECEIVED_ERROR
      Specified by:
      receiveError in interface ClientListener

    • gameOver

      public void gameOver(String reason, String winner)
      Called when a game over message is received. Depending on reason and winner, adds state UIState.GAME_OVER_VICTORY, UIState.GAME_OVER_DEFEAT, UIState.GAME_OVER_DRAW or UIState.GAME_OVER_DISCONNECTED.
      Specified by:
      gameOver in interface ClientListener
      Parameters:
      reason - Reason for winning, either Protocol.VICTORY, Protocol.DRAW, or Protocol.DISCONNECT
      winner - Username of winner, null if reason is Protocol.DRAW

    • requestMove

      public void requestMove()
      Called when an interface should request a move. Adds state UIState.ASK_FOR_MOVE
      Specified by:
      requestMove in interface ClientMoveInput

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Instantiates a ClientTUI with the TUIType Human.
      Parameters:
      args - Unused
